briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of RTX-GRT7039 in Adult Subjects With Knee Osteoarthritis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Phase III Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Intra-articular Injections of RTX-GRT7039 in Adult Subjects With Pain Associated With Osteoarthritis of the Knee
summary: A double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled, parallel-group, multi-site, clinical trial to confirm the efficacy and safety of repeated injections of RTX-GRT7039 versus placebo in patients who have pain associated with osteoarthritis of the knee despite standard of care.

primaryOutcome.measure: Least Squares Mean (Standard Error) [LS-mean (SE)] Change From Baseline in WOMAC Pain Subscale Score at Week 12
